TopicTitle: What way around does the heat shield go?

Articles.Content:
What way around does the heat shield go? One direction seems to give it a lip/rim and the other doesn't. Which side is meant to face the heat?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T20:30:32Z" title="04/30/2015 08:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by THX1138**
In its default orientation, the side that's facing the floor of the VAB should be the side that faces Kerbin while reentering.
Convex side should be going through the atmo first.
If you flip it over though, I think it gets a lip around the convex side which would make it less aerodynamic.
It has a built in fairing to cover the gap. That makes it more aerodynamic.
**)** to the bottom > direction of re-entry.
